data.name: Battle Nations
data.detailed_description:
Battle Nations is back! Build your empire and lead your armies to victory! Choose from traditional troops and vehicles or unleash exotic forces like mammoths, velociraptors, sandworms, and futuristic plasma units!

War has engulfed the continent of Ateria, and only your leadership can end the rebel threat. Construct and manage a thriving city, gather critical resources, and assemble your unstoppable army. Engage in epic battles across diverse terrains using various unique units. Build and customize your thriving city, optimizing resource management and defense. Unite with memorable heroes and charismatic misfits, each with their own compelling stories. Experience a richly developed wartime narrative filled with humor, drama, and surprises. Compete and collaborate with players around the globe through guilds and multiplayer events. Strategically unlock powerful mercenaries, tanks, and one-of-a-kind special forces. Challenge yourself with tactical combat scenarios and PvP battles to prove your supremacy.

Join the ranks, Commander—your empire awaits!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Windows 10 21H1
  • Processor: x86-compatible 2.2GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: x86-compatible 3.0 GHz or faster processor
